message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMUTILIZATION_FV_FROMDATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A From Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMUTILIZATION_FV_TODATE_LATER_FROMDATE
message.locale: The To Date must be later than the From Date.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMUTILIZATION_FV_TODATE_LATER_OR_EQUAL_TO_FROMDATE
message.locale: The To Date must be later than or equal to the From Date.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMUTILIZATION_VERIFICATION_ITEM_UTILIZATION_CANCELLED
message.locale: This verification item utilization has already been cancelled.
This verification item utilisation has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_UTILIZATION_FV_IMPACT_ACTIVE_VERIFICATION_REQUIREMENTS
message.locale: The removal of this verification item utilization may impact one or more verification requirements.
The removal of this verification item utilisation may impact one or more verification requirements.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_UTILIZATION_FV_MODIFY_IMPACT_ACTIVE_VERIFICATION_REQUIREMENTS
message.locale: The modification of this verification item utilization may impact one or more verification requirements.
The modification of this verification item utilisation may impact one or more verification requirements.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMUTILIZATION_XRV_NAME_AND_DETAILS_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A verification item utilization with the same name and details already exists.
A verification item utilisation with the same name and details already exists.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMUTILIZATION_FV_WARNING_DAYS_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_EXPIRY_DAYS
message.locale: The number specified for warning days must be less than that specified for expiry days.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMUTILIZATION_FV_NEGATIVE_EXPIRY_DAYS
message.locale: The Expiry Days specified must not be less than zero days.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMUTILIZATION_FV_NEGATIVE_WARNING_DAYS
message.locale: The Warning Days specified must not be less than zero days.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMUTILIZATION_FV_WARNING_DAYS_WITHOUT_EXPIRY_DAYS
message.locale: Warning Days cannot be specified if there are no Expiry Days specified.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMUTILIZATION_FV_EXPIRY_DAYS_EVENT_WITHOUT_EXPIRY_DAYS
message.locale: A Expiry Date Event cannot be specified if there are no Expiry Days specified.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMUTILIZATION_FV_EXPIRY_DAYS_GREATER_THAN_VERIFICATION_UTILIZATION
message.locale: The number of Expiry Days must not exceed the period of the verification item utilization.
The number of Expiry Days must not exceed the period of the verification item utilisation.
